name: 兽食欲Animal appetite
description:
Lovely, beautiful women's corner color, in order to collect the food of their own ethnic group in the cube, the journey of the rescue companion, the rescue partner, and the food.

Animal appetite is a leisure play that combines magic and animal niang, the ability to match skills, the ability to save partners and the ability to kill the enemy!

Animal appetite combines the pigeon elements, the energy system and the partner system, and has some new ideas for the pigeon gameplay.

Animal appetite is a single game with three different roles. The story of the game took place after the Lord of the devil ran away with the brave, the animal family had a shortage of food, and the orc had to go on a journey to find food. Next, we will continue to enrich the new content of the role section and the content of the map scene and the rich event system and adjust the balance.

Support mouse and keyboard control. Welcome to the official qq group 496996080 feedback advice, we will try to adopt it.
